translation: Verily, these hosts of gods enter into Thee; some extol Thee with joined palms in fear, saying, 'May it be well!' Bands of great sages and perfected ones praise Thee with complete hymns.
commentary: 11.21 Ami these? Hi verily? You Thee? Surasanghas hosts of gods? enter enter? Some some? Bhitaḥ in fear? Pranjalayaḥ with joined palms? sing extol? Swasti may it be well? It is thus? Having said having said? Maharshi Siddha Sanghas bands of great Rishis and Siddhas? praise paise? You Thee? with hymns with praises? Pushkalabhih complete.Commentary Pushkalabhih means complete or wellworded praises or praises full of deep meanings.Great sages like Narada and perfected ones like Kapila praise Thee with inspiring hymns.
